accordion.title: What is OneClickHuman, and how does it work?
accordion.desc: OneClickHuman converts Al-generated content into text that resembles human writing, preserving the original formatting and correct grammar. It also bypasses several Al detection tools, such as ZeroGPT and GPTZero.

accordion.title: Is it possible to use OneClickHuman for multiple languages?
accordion.desc: Absolutely. Our software supports more than 10 languages, enabling you to engage with a global audience effectively.

accordion.title: Does OneClickHuman preserve my content's original formatting?
accordion.desc: Absolutely. We maintain all your content's original formatting, including headings, bullet points, hyperlinks, and more.

accordion.title: How do I get customer support?
accordion.desc: Email or live chat. Business, Advanced, and Enterprise plans include priority support.

accordion.title: Is my data safe with OneClickHuman?
accordion.desc: Yes. We prioritize data security and privacy; your content is encrypted and never shared.

accordion.title: How does OneClickHuman handle my data?
accordion.desc: We store your content only for the time needed to process and humanize it. Once this is complete, any temporary copies are automatically purged from our servers.

accordion.title: Is OneClickHuman GDPR-compliant?
accordion.desc: Yes. We comply with GDPR and other relevant data protection regulations. We never share or sell your data to third parties, and we use encryption to secure all user content.

accordion.title: Can you provide a Data Processing Agreement (DPA)?
accordion.desc: If you require a formal DPA for compliance purposes, our team can provide one upon request to ensure you meet internal or regulatory requirements.
